mapper.insert: insert into board(b_writer, b_password, b_title, b_contents,b_hits, b_date) value(#{b_writer}, #{b_password}, #{b_title}, #{b_contents}, 0, now())
mapper.update: update board set b_hits = b_hits+1 where b_number=#{b_number}
update board set b_title=#{b_title}, b_contents=#{b_contents} where b_number=#{b_number}
mapper.select: select * from board where b_title like ('%', #{b_title}, '%')
